list_translation_mean.translate_mean: sách tập đọc và đánh vần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a substance used as a preparatory coat on previously unpainted wood, metal, or canvas, especially to prevent the absorption of subsequent layers of paint or the development of rust.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Áp dụng ba lớp sơn lót

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cap or cylinder containing a compound which responds to friction or an electrical impulse and ignites the charge in a cartridge or explosive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the nitro-cellulose is ignited by the spark that comes from the primer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cellulose Nitro bị đốt cháy bởi tia lửa xuất phát từ mồi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small pump for pumping fuel to prime an internal combustion engine, especially in an aircraft.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: no more than four pumps of the primer usually suffice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: không quá bốn máy bơm của mồi thường là đủ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a molecule that serves as a starting material for a polymerization process.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the duplex RNA primer cannot initiate DNA replication
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trimer RNA song công không thể bắt đầu sao chép DNA

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an elementary textbook that serves as an introduction to a subject of study or is used for teaching children to read.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một triết lý năm đầu tiên
